participant_1.background:
I have always been close to my parents.
I am excited to explore my new city and find new ways to style my curly hair.
I will not fight back, but I will stand up for myself and others.
I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.

participant_2.background:
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
My family is very supportive of my writing.
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.
i couldn t live without my cell phone.
my father worked 11 hours a day.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
I'm impressed! I love pottery. I've always wanted to try it out.
It's a lot of fun, but it's also a lot of work. But it's worth it when you see the finished product.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you're able to do something you love.
Thanks. It's been a great way for me to express myself.
What about you? What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read, write, and spend time with my family.
What do you like to read?
I read a lot of different things, but I mostly read fiction. I love getting lost in a good book.
That sounds really fun. I've never been much of a reader, but I've been trying to get into it more.
It's definitely worth it. There are so many great books out there.
I'm sure there are. I'll have to start looking for some.
I'm sure you'll find something you like
